t: Fantasia Games | Board Game Publisher | BoardGameGeek
s: Fantasia Games was established in 2020 and is based in Larnaca, Cyprus and Alexandroupoli, Greece. It is the result of two passionate artists, Yorgo Tsalamanis (a.k.a. Yoma) and Thanos Argiris, who love to create exciting new worlds for game enthusiasts across the globe to enjoy.
